channel.title: The server 127.0.0.1 wont work for me
channel.description: the server that its automatically set out when u opent he client is 127.0.0.1...but when i try to log into it it always says its down...all my friends get it to load all the time...i can still play on other servers but the 127.0.0.1 wont work...so does anyone know y this would be?

my server is ip (plz dont hack my c0mputer) 127.0.0.1 how can i get on it plz help me??!?!?!?!!?

item.title: The server 127.0.0.1 wont work for me
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Q4: 7) Is my ip 127.0.0.1?
A4: NO IT AINT THAT Seems like everytime some one posts this you either get a respond like for example:
Hello join our server now its 24/7 our ip is 127.0.0.1
REPLY 1: Noob
Reply 2: LOL!!!
Reply 3: WOW ITS A GOOD SERVER LOL
